<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64pauth"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64pauth">AArch64PAuth</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Variants of check performed on an authenticated pointer.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="comment">/// In cases such as authenticating the LR value when performing a tail call</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="comment">/// or when re-signing a signed pointer with a different signing schema,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="comment">/// a failed authentication may not generate an exception on its own and may</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="comment">/// create an authentication or signing oracle if not checked explicitly.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A number of check methods modify control flow in a similar way by</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="comment">/// rewriting the code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#96;&#96;&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">///   &lt;authenticate LR&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">///   &lt;more instructions&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#96;&#96;&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="comment">/// as follows:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#96;&#96;&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment">///   &lt;authenticate LR&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="comment">///   &lt;method-specific checker&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="comment">/// on&#95;fail:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">///   brk &lt;code&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">/// on&#95;success:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">///   &lt;more instructions&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#96;&#96;&#96;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64pauth/#abf78b4a589091577668be8331dbf3e10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">enum class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64pauth/#abf78b4a589091577668be8331dbf3e10">AuthCheckMethod</a> &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Do not check the value at all</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64pauth/#abf78b4a589091577668be8331dbf3e10a6adf97f83acf6453d4a6a4b1070f3754"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64pauth/#abf78b4a589091577668be8331dbf3e10a6adf97f83acf6453d4a6a4b1070f3754">None</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Perform a load to a temporary register</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64pauth/#abf78b4a589091577668be8331dbf3e10a24204a7fa8ab4d609a76a48ac4673b22"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64pauth/#abf78b4a589091577668be8331dbf3e10a24204a7fa8ab4d609a76a48ac4673b22">DummyLoad</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Check by comparing bits 62 and 61 of the authenticated address.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This method modifies control flow and inserts the following checker:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#96;&#96;&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   eor Xtmp, Xn, Xn, lsl #1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   tbz Xtmp, #62, on&#95;success</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#96;&#96;&#96;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64pauth/#abf78b4a589091577668be8331dbf3e10a47343d56dc562d3a8366d3854eb64161"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64pauth/#abf78b4a589091577668be8331dbf3e10a47343d56dc562d3a8366d3854eb64161">HighBitsNoTBI</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Check by comparing the authenticated value with an XPAC-ed one without</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// using PAuth instructions not encoded as HINT. Can only be applied to LR.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This method modifies control flow and inserts the following checker:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#96;&#96;&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   mov Xtmp, LR</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   xpaclri           ; encoded as &quot;hint #7&quot;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   ; Note: at this point, the LR register contains the address as if</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   ; the authentication succeeded and the temporary register contains the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   ; &#42;real&#42; result of authentication.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   cmp Xtmp, LR</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   b.eq on&#95;success</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#96;&#96;&#96;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64pauth/#abf78b4a589091577668be8331dbf3e10a1fb8b484947fc2d97a18d9b90e0c08fb"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64pauth/#abf78b4a589091577668be8331dbf3e10a1fb8b484947fc2d97a18d9b90e0c08fb">XPACHint</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Similar to XPACHint but using Armv8.3-only XPAC instruction, thus</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// not restricted to LR:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#96;&#96;&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   mov Xtmp, Xn</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   xpac(i|d) Xn</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   cmp Xtmp, Xn</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   b.eq on&#95;success</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#96;&#96;&#96;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64pauth/#abf78b4a589091577668be8331dbf3e10ae34527c9d45ac8d5e68634911bfcd36e"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64pauth/#abf78b4a589091577668be8331dbf3e10ae34527c9d45ac8d5e68634911bfcd36e">XPAC</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88" lineLink="#a1916a718bc5fe45363e746d758e502f7"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#define AUTH&#95;CHECK&#95;METHOD&#95;CL&#95;VALUES&#95;COMMON                                     \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="preprocessor">  clEnumValN(AArch64PAuth::AuthCheckMethod::None, &quot;none&quot;,                      \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="preprocessor">             &quot;Do not check authenticated address&quot;),                            \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="preprocessor">      clEnumValN(AArch64PAuth::AuthCheckMethod::DummyLoad, &quot;load&quot;,             \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="preprocessor">                 &quot;Perform dummy load from authenticated address&quot;),             \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="preprocessor">      clEnumValN(                                                              \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="preprocessor">          AArch64PAuth::AuthCheckMethod::HighBitsNoTBI, &quot;high-bits-notbi&quot;,     \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="preprocessor">          &quot;Compare bits 62 and 61 of address (TBI should be disabled)&quot;),       \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="preprocessor">      clEnumValN(AArch64PAuth::AuthCheckMethod::XPAC, &quot;xpac&quot;,                  \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="preprocessor">                 &quot;Compare with the result of XPAC (requires Armv8.3-a)&quot;)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
